titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish an Abraham Lincoln Research and Interpretive Center.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Committee on Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.1584.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 6/23/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Abraham Lincoln Interpretive Center in Illinois, to be added to and administered as part of the Lincoln Home National Historic Site. Sets forth provisions regarding: (1) acquisition of land; (2) construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities; (3) cooperative agreements; and (4) acquisition of documents and artifacts. Authorizes appropriations.
